resources.string: Hey there, This is Kushagra Saxena, an app developer with android development as my domain, specialising in User Interfaces. I am pursing my B.Tech in Computer Science in Ghaziabad and have a year of experience in app development.
I have done my schooling from Assisi Convent School, Baheri affiliated to ICSE board.
I am pursuing B.Tech from Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, Ghaziabad affiliated to AKTU.

To secure a challenging position in a reputable organization to expand my learnings, knowledge, and skills. Secure a responsible career opportunity to fully utilize my training and skills, while making a significant contribution to the success of the company. and utilize my skills and technical studies background to the maximum.
